question: A grasshopper eats plants, rabbit eats grasshopper and a hawk eats the rabbit. The position of grasshopper in the given food chain is of:
explanation: Primary producers are plants. Primary consumers are which feed directly and only on all or part of living plants. Secondary consumers are which feed only on plant-eating animals. Tertiary or higher level consumers, which feed only on animal-eating animals. Grasshopper in above food chain is a primary consumer.
